derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French and Old French roberie, from the verb rober (see rob)

entry.def: Robbery is the crime of stealing money or property from a bank, shop, or vehicle, often by using force or threats.

example.ex: The gang members committed dozens of armed robberies...
example.tran: 这个帮派的成员犯下了数十宗持械抢劫案。

example.ex: The man was serving a sentence for robbery with violence.
example.tran: 这个男子因暴力抢劫而正在服刑。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,情况"; 2. 表名词,"场所,地点"

stems_affixes.word_buile: brave勇敢的+ery行为,情况→n.[U]英勇,勇敢;勇气
bribe贿赂+ery行为,情况→n.贿赂的行为
chicane诈骗+ery行为,情况→n.欺诈,欺骗
ef出+front前面+ery行为,情况→脸面出去→不要脸
robb=rob抢+ery行为,情况→n.抢劫,劫掠,盗取
trick诡计+ery行为,情况→n.欺骗,诡计
bake烤+ery场所,地点→烤[面包]的地方
cemet睡觉+ery场所,地点→n.坟墓,墓地,坟场
green绿色+ery场所,地点→n.温室,草木
monast一个人住+ery场所,地点→n.男修道院,僧院
nurse养育,护理+ery场所,地点→nursery托儿所

Sentence.sentence: seven robberies and about 60 other violent attacks, most of these involving fights at parties.
She was a victim of the robbery.
Well, there have been a lot of robberies recently.

They range from minor cases of deliberate damaging of things to much more serious offenses, such as car accidents involving drunk drivers or bank robberies but Florence has to report all of these violations from the thief who took typewriters from every unlock room in the dormitory to the thief who stole one million dollars worth of art work from the university museum.

sentences.en: A fair exchange is no robbery.
A large robbery was attempted by the thieves.
sentences.cn: 这些窃贼图谋进行一次大规模抢劫。

sentences.en: A man is being questioned in connection with the robbery.
sentences.cn: 一名男子就那起抢劫案接受查问。

sentences.en: Someone tipped off the police about the robbery.
sentences.cn: 有人向警方报告了有关抢劫的消息。

sentences.en: ￡3000 for a useless old car like this? That’s daylight robbery!
sentences.cn: 这辆破车要3 000英镑？这简直是明抢嘛！
